short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will convert all instances of imgur.com/gallery/ links to direct links

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension replaces all links that point to imgur's gallery feature to direct links to the image

You can view the source code here: https://github.com/jonluca/Degallerify
